message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds significant value to us, and we believe it would be a great addition to your collection. Considering its quality and uniqueness, we're offering it to you at an exclusive price of $12,000. We understand its worth to you might be around $8,000, but we hope this offer presents a favorable opportunity for both parties. Should you have any questions or wish to proceed, please let us know. We look forward to your consideration.
